search.name: Price Watch
search.description:
Street price search for computer related items.
Switches:
/motherboard - Motherboards
/cpu - CPU / Processors
/ram - Memory
/video - Video Cards
/sound - Sound Cards
/hd - Hard Drives
/cd - CD-ROM Drives
/cdrw - CD Burners
/dvd - DVD-ROM Drives
/fd - Floppy Drives
/monitor - Monitors
/case - Cases
/psu - Power Supplies
/barebones - PC Bare Bones Kits
Examples:
pw Athlon XP 1900 /cpu
